user_question: How can I stream a live concert from my backyard using a drone, and generate an image of the setup?
final_answer: To stream a live concert from your backyard using a drone, you need a drone with a camera, a stable internet connection, and a streaming platform like YouTube or Twitch. The DJI Phantom 4 Pro and DJI Mavic 2 Pro are recommended for high-quality video streaming. Ensure a stable internet connection by using a high-speed router, minimizing other internet usage, and positioning the router close to the streaming area. Image of the setup generated.
